item.title: Install Gnome Boxes on Chromebook
item.description: sudo apt update sudo apt install qemu-kvm libvirt-clients libvirt-daemon-system bridge-utils virtinst libvirt-daemon virt-manager -y sudo apt install gnome-boxes cd /etc/libvirt sudo nano qemu.conf Uncomment user and group: add the line to the end of the file and save: xhost +
